module.name: webpage-to-markdown-module
module.description: Convert webpages to markdown format preserving structure and formatting

webpage_to_markdown.name: webpage_to_markdown
webpage_to_markdown.description: Converts web pages to markdown format, preserving structure and formatting

url.description: The URL of the webpage to convert

includeImages.description: Whether to include image links in the markdown

includeLinks.description: Whether to preserve hyperlinks in the markdown

maxLength.description: Maximum length of the markdown output in characters

waitForSelector.description: Optional CSS selector to wait for before converting
